steps.name: Navigate to login page
Navigate to URL: https://192.168.2.90/paip/login
Enter username
Wait for element to be visible with locator: By.cssSelector: [formcontrolname="username"]
Wait for element to be present with locator: By.cssSelector: [formcontrolname="username"]
Enter password
Wait for element to be visible with locator: By.cssSelector: [formcontrolname="password"]
Wait for element to be present with locator: By.cssSelector: [formcontrolname="password"]
Click login button
Wait for element to be clickable with locator: By.id: btnlogin
Wait for element to be visible with locator: By.id: btnlogin
Wait for element to be present with locator: By.id: btnlogin
Terminate session if exists
Wait for element to be clickable with locator: By.cssSelector: [title="Continue"]
